accessibility_notes: Use semantic HTML (nav, article, section, header, footer)
Include ARIA attributes for interactive elements (buttons, modals, tabs)
Maintain high color contrast ratios (WCAG AA minimum 4.5:1)
Ensure keyboard navigation support on all interactive elements
Provide alt text for all images (descriptive, concise)
Use proper heading hierarchy (h1, h2, h3...)
Include form labels and error messages
Test with screen readers (NVDA, JAWS, VoiceOver)
